title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! Mar 19th thru Mar
description:
Seven more broadcasts of the number one rated late night radio program in history! Yes, of course, Coast to Coast AM! Thanks in advance to all the seeders and uploaders of these torrents. I hope you all enjoy! Until next week my friends. I&#039;ll see you out there in dreamland! Later All! Stokeman Out.......

Wednesday March 19th, 2008
Hidden Archeology & Cosmic Hierarchy
Author and researcher Michael Cremo returned to discuss &#039;forbidden archeology,&#039; ancient Sanskrit knowledge, and cosmic hierarchy. He shared evidence that humans existed on this planet millions of years ago. Examples included, a human skeleton found in... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Michael Cremo, Robert Felix

Thursday March 20th, 2008
John Titor & Time Travel
Historian for alleged time traveler John Titor, Oliver Williams reviewed the facts of the remarkable case, and related some of Titor&#039;s past predictions to recent news stories. Titor&#039;s story has been pieced together from posts he made on Internet discussion... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Oliver Williams, Jerome Corsi, Richard C. Hoagland

Friday March 21st, 2008
Full Moon Friday Open Lines
During Open Lines, George offered a special &#039;lost&#039; line for callers who have had things vanish under perplexing circumstances. Josh from Iowa City said a buddy dropped a Reese&#039;s Peanut Butter Cup under the car, searched but could not find it beneath the...
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Open Lines, Helen Reddy

Saturday March 22nd, 2008
Lindbergh Baby Found!?
Raised as an orphan by strangers, Charles A. Lindbergh Jr. shared evidence gained by personal research and questioning under hypnosis to support his claim that he is in fact the grown kidnapped son of famous aviator Charles Lindbergh. Lindbergh... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Charles A. Lindbergh Jr.

Sunday March 23rd, 2008
The Bond Code
Author Philip Gardiner joined George Knapp (email) to discuss the life of James Bond author Ian Fleming and his associations with the world of the occult which led him to create a series of clues, ciphers and codes within his novels. Early in his... 
Host: George Knapp
Guest(s): Philip Gardiner, Luke Fortune

Monday March 24th, 2008
The Science of Prediction
Appearing during the middle two hours, mathematician and author David Orrell discussed the science of prediction from ancient history until the present day. In particular, he looked at how chaos theory and complexity limit our ability to predict weather,... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): David Orrell, Ron Paul

Tuesday March 25th, 2008
Alternative Agriculture
A subsistence farmer in Hawaii, Jon Biloon shared his studies of alternative agriculture, and discussed the dangers of genetically modified (GM) foods and how agri-business is robbing individuals of health and spirituality. The genetic modification... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Jon Biloon, Rob Simone
